principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix SaaS utility with consumer-grade polish.
Content is King: Data legibility is the priority.
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load.
Contrast: High contrast for text, subtle contrast for borders.

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: This is a Node.js + Express + EJS project. DO NOT use React or JSX.
Use the provided Tailwind classes to replicate the 'Shadcn' aesthetic in plain HTML/EJS.
Implement a 'Layout' partial (header/sidebar) to avoid code duplication.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
For the Dashboard, use a Bento Grid layout (mix of col-span-1, col-span-2 cards).
Status Badges: Use the specific color combinations defined in 'colors.status'.
Mobile Responsiveness: Ensure the sidebar is collapsible (use a hamburger menu on mobile) and tables have horizontal scroll wrappers.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' looks. Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
Do not use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 or Slate-950.
Add subtle transitions to all hover states (transition-all duration-200).
Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' for grid layouts to create breathing room.
